directions: Sauté bacon and shallots in large pot over medium-high heat until bacon is crisp, about 7 minutes. Add olive oil and garlic; stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes with juice, clam juice, wine, and saffron; bring to boil. Reduce heat; simmer 5 minutes. Add beans and fish; bring to simmer. Cover; simmer until fish is just opaque in center, about 5 minutes. Season stew to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 14 1/2-ounce can petite diced tomatoes in juice
1 1/2 pounds halibut fillets, cut into 1 1/2-inch chunks
title: White Bean and Halibut Stew
